usage: Used for gym exercise, strength training, muscle toning, and general fitness workouts.
key_features: Color coded thick vinyl coating for comfortable and non-slip feel (for vinyl variants)
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
ai_description: A pair of bright green hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating and white “KAKSS 3 KG” markings on the ends. The compact, flat-sided design prevents rolling, while the coated metal core gives a solid feel, ideal for handheld gym and home workouts.
target_audience: People doing home or gym workouts who want 3 kg hand weights, including fitness enthusiasts and beginners seeking light strength training equipment.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Pair Green Hex Dumbbell Weights 3 kg & 3 kg
